text: 'ila man aikhtataf min alshayatin alkhtft, wahi alkalimat yasmaeha min alsama' bsret, fylqyha 'iilaa aldhy thth, wylqyha alakhar 'iilaa aldhy thth, frbma 'adrakah alshhab almudi' qabl 'an ylqyha, warubama 'alqaha bqadar allah taealaa qabl 'an yatih alshhab, fyhrqh fayadhhab biha alakhar 'iilaa alkhnt, fykdhbwn maeaha miayat kdhbt
